projectName: Shopify RSS Feed to Google Chat
projectDescription: A lightweight service that monitors Shopify's changelog RSS feed and sends new updates to Google Chat via webhook.
keyFeatures: Automated RSS feed monitoring for Shopify changelog
Google Chat webhook integration with formatted card messages
Incremental processing to avoid duplicate notifications
Vercel cron job scheduling for daily updates
Built with Bun and Hono for fast, lightweight execution
publicApiSurface: getRSSFeed() - Fetch and parse RSS feed
filterNewItems() - Filter items newer than last processed date
sendToGchat() - Send formatted updates to Google Chat
